product_desc:
SalemCash is a digital currency that enables instant payments to all, around the world. It has the option of growth to increase its capitalization. Consequently, SalemCash uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority since managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. 

Peer-to-peer Payment:

Once you have installed a SalemCash wallet on your computer or mobile phone, it will generate your first SalemCash address and you can create more whenever you need one. 

Blockchain:

The blockchain is a shared public ledger on which the entire SaleCash network relies. All confirmed transactions are included in the blockchain. 

Private Keys:

A private key is generated for every transaction. The latter is a transfer of value between SalemCash wallets that gets included in the blockchain. 

Mining:

Mining is a distributed consensus system that is used to confirm waiting transactions by including them in the blockchain.
